andromeda.why: Refuses forced hustle; sovereignty to be still before engaging.

arcturus.why: Baseline regulation—create a still container so focus can arise.

draco.why: Stoic performance to prove toughness despite dysregulation.

lyra.why: Function and pacing, not an aesthetic/authorship axis.

orion-dark.why: Freeze-as-obedience: stillness demanded to enforce control.

orion-light.why: Discipline to quiet the root and ready the will before action.

pleiades.why: Soothing cadence protects bonds from frantic pressure.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching focus hygiene; no formal transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Declines coercive pacing—chooses when to hold still.

arcturus.why: Places resources and bodies for concentration—conditions-first design.

draco.why: Sentry focus—guarding the perimeter while the work concentrates.

lyra.why: Clean, unfussy tone that makes calm focus receivable.

orion-dark.why: Protocol to suppress spontaneity rather than enable focus.

orion-light.why: Fortitude to maintain a steady hold until the opening.

pleiades.why: Supportive pacing and comfort so concentration can settle.

andromeda.why: Reclaims choice after being manipulated into ‘sit still’ against truth.

arcturus.why: Regulation wobble—oscillation between fidget and rigid freeze.

draco.why: Stoic policing of others’ pace to maintain rank.

lyra.why: Performative calm/optics instead of real stillness.

orion-dark.why: Freeze as control doctrine—obedience masquerading as ‘focus.’

orion-light.why: Ordeal of correction—admit misreads, reset posture, refine focus.

pleiades.why: Sedating/coddling that avoids building true capacity.

sirius.why: Self-forging through trial; no canon yet.

andromeda.why: Protects sovereignty to pause—stillness serves freedom, not capture.

arcturus.why: Translates stillness into protocol—focus windows, buffers, guardrails.

draco.why: Gate watch—keeps distractions/predators from breaking the hold.

lyra.why: Economy of motion—graceful minimalism supports the work.

orion-dark.why: Orthodoxy risk: ritualized stillness over living intelligence.

orion-light.why: Mentor-by-presence—hold the line under pressure, then act.

pleiades.why: Humane pacing preserves trust during concentrated effort.

sirius.why: Focus protocol teaching—discipline of stillness by example.

andromeda.why: Resists propaganda that your stillness must be available on demand.

arcturus.why: Projected as the universal ‘calm anchor’ → burnout/scapegoat when refusing.

draco.why: Rank contests over who can suppress motion longest.

lyra.why: Iconic steadiness—unshowy presence steadies the field.

orion-dark.why: Stillness-as-image: PR stoicism to control the room.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—focus only where it is rightful.

pleiades.why: Placating via ‘calm’ instead of naming misfit conditions.

sirius.why: Instruction-by-presence: focus ethics under pressure and myth.

andromeda.why: Liberates communities from frantic capture—restoring the right to be still.

arcturus.why: Elder standards—cadence doctrine, review cycles, renewal/sunset of holds.

draco.why: Guardian presence—keeps the vigil so the work can mature safely.

lyra.why: Quiet majesty—culture tunes to dignified calm and economy.

orion-dark.why: Canonizing stillness into hierarchy rather than service to life.

orion-light.why: Warrior elder—impeccable timing to hold or move.

pleiades.why: Altitude here is standards and guardianship, not bonding/soothing.

sirius.why: Stillness sage—teaches the law of focus and rightful pacing by embodied example.
